.lnb_nav>li{margin-top:12px;padding-bottom:12px}.lnb .lnb_nav>li>a{position:relative;display:block;color:#000;font-size:18px;font-weight:700;padding:15px;letter-spacing:1px}.lnb .lnb_nav>li>a:before{left:50%}.lnb .lnb_nav>li>a:after{right:50%}.lnb .lnb_nav>li>a:after,.lnb
